nodes.text: Chullka was a male Gormak spymaster living on Voss during the Galactic War. Around 3640 BBY he was the oversser of a Gormak war party that assembled in the Gormak Lands beyond Outpost Skyline and began attacking convoys of the reconstituted Sith Empire. The Imperials put a bounty on his head, which resulted in the assault on the war party, in which Chullka was killed.
Spymaster Chullka appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the mission "Gormak Sabotage" on Voss.
